channel.title: OpenTelemetry-Native Traces, Metrics, and Logs in a single pane
channel.description: A single tool for all your observability needs - APM, logs, metrics, exceptions, alerts, and dashboards powered by a powerful query builder.
channel.item: https://www.signoz.io/blog/2024-04-04-signal-35 Integrations for new Data Sources, Upgrades to Alerts & Kubecon Paris - SigNal 35 https://www.signoz.io/blog/2024-04-04-signal-35 undefined Thu, 04 Apr 2024 00:00:00 GMT address@yoursite.com (SigNoz Inc) Product Updates
